text:
Full Stack Engineer - React + Redux - SLC area - kuali.co

Our products help universities and colleges manage their administrative business so they can focus on their mission of research and teaching. Our Research product has been in production for many years and is used by institutions of all sizes. It has improved efficiencies for our customers. Our team is embracing cloud native technologies, continuous delivery, and modern agile development processes to deliver new and amazing experiences to our customers. Our team’s knowledge and skills are deep and wide, we work hard, we are open and collaborative (everyone has a voice and contributes), and we have fun.

We are working on exciting projects to rapidly accelerate our transition from a single integrated Java system to a set of connected stand-alone, multi-tenant, apps. We’d love your expertise, energy, and help as we continue to evolve. Knowing both Java and full stack JS is a bonus.

https://kuali.workable.com/jobs/165548
